scripts.dev: npm run build:super-editor && npm run dev:superdoc
scripts.build: npm run build:super-editor && npm run build:superdoc
scripts.reset: npm run clean:packages && rm -rf ./node_modules && rm -rf ./packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf ./package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.publish: npm run build && cd packages/superdoc && npm publish --access public
scripts.prettier: if [ "$(echo $npm_config_argv | grep -o '"remain":\[\]' | wc -l)" -eq 1 ]; then echo 'Error: No arguments passed to prettier'; exit 1; fi && npx prettier --write
